txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have returned from Misthallow. They come with a story of a terrible beast, the sharpest fangs, and deadly claws of the greatest length! They call her Bergelmir. They managed to avoid the beast, barely, but a caravan of provisions would not be so lucky as a group of nimble scouts!

'We can not let this deadly beast roam freely on the pass to Misthallow!'
Your mission is to find and defeat the great hunting cat which terrorizes Misthallow.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Misthallow.
You may be ambushed after completing your objective.
You have been tasked with dispatching a powerful beast in Misthallow.
Complete Mission: The Beast of Misthallow
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Steel Keep. Good hunting, my friend!'
'Well done! To think there was not one, but two terrible beasts in the Misthallow! Hopefully there were only two and no more.'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
A beast in Misthallow has been terrorizing those on the southern path from the Grey Mountains….\n\nYour mission is to find and defeat the great hunting cat which terrorizes Misthallow.
